15107829,s2,T20,T2,In order to identify novel partners of ,Smad, proteins in transcriptional regulation, we performed a two-hybrid screen using ",Smad5,", a protein that is activated predominantly by bone morphogenetic protein (BMP) signaling.",Not_a_complex

15107829,s5,T8,T9,Biochemical studies in mammalian cells demonstrated that ,Smad5, binds to both known mammalian isoforms of ,Suv39h," proteins, and that Smad proteins activated by the TGF-beta signaling pathway, Smad2 and Smad3, do not bind with significant affinity.",Complex_formation

15107829,s7,T32,T13,These data suggest a model where association of ,Smad, proteins with ,Suv39h," methyltransferases can repress or silence genes involved in developmental processes, and argues that inefficient gene repression may result in the alteration of the differentiated phenotype.",Complex_formation
